definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: make a noise, move noisily, confuse, discomfit (cf. [[[הים]]])—
move noisily, trans., drive a wagon in threshing [[גִּלְגַּל עֶגְּלָתוֹ וּפָרָשָׁיו]] ´[[ה]] Is 28:28 (‖[[דושׁ]]).

confuse, discomfit, c. acc. Ex 14:24, Ex 23:27, Jos 10:10, Ju Jdg 4:15, 1Sa 7:10, Ps 18:15 = 2Sa 22:15 (‖[[הפיץ]]), Ps 144:6 (‖ id.); discomfit, vex, 2Ch 15:6 c. acc. & [[בְּכָל־חָרָה]] of instr.; c. acc. also De 2:15 (sq. [[עַד תֻּמָּם]]), Es 9:24 (sq. [[לְאַבְּדָם]]); prob. also Je 51:34 (‖[[אָכַל]]), cf. [[הוּם]] De 7:23.
